entry.title: New release for Kapowarr: V1.0.0
entry.content:
A Little Message

It has been almost exactly 9 months and 208 commits since the last release. Turns out that making a software stable takes a long time. I still have some things on my list that I would've liked to be included in this release, but since the academic year has started I don't have as much time anymore and I don't want to keep you waiting even longer. This release is pretty much stable (I haven't gotten a single bug report in the last few weeks from my alpha-release testers), so that on itself should be a big improvement! On top of the additions/changes listed below, there are loads of other, smaller changes that you might come across. The new documentation hub is also live now, with extra information and better instructions. From now on, I'll make releases way more often, with smaller changes, so you don't have to wait as long again :).

What's Changed

Added

UI

  1. General UI improvement
  2. Added web socket for live UI updates (#43, #155)
  3. Added URL params to Add Volume page to allow reloading

Adding Volume

  1. Added filters on Add Volume page (#105)
  2. Clicking on already added volume leads to it's page
  3. Added option to search on add
  4. Added monitor schemes when adding

Library Import

  1. Added folder filter
  2. Added option to apply folder limit to parent folder
  3. Improved file grouping
  4. Improved file-to-volume matching

Volume(s)

  1. Improved Special State detection (#140)
  2. Added override option of Special State (#109)
  3. Added fuzzy library search
  4. Added "wanted" sorting option

File Handling

  1. Increased supported filenames
  2. Improved support for weird issue numbers (incl. fixed handling of issue 0)
  3. Added support for general files (i.e. metadata files and cover images) (#79)
  4. Added ability to delete files

Downloading

  1. Added WeTransfer download client (#160)
  2. Added Pixeldrain download client
  3. Increased blocklist data, improved decisions and reason reports
  4. Increased queue data and queue history data
  5. Added "Remove All" and "Remove and blocklist" button
  6. Improved auto search algorithm
  7. Added handling of possibly broken years on GC

Settings/System

  1. Added support for folder structure in file naming formats (#125)
  2. Added restart and shutdown buttons (#36)
  3. Improved error messages for torrent clients
  4. Improved logging and also log to log files (which can be downloaded from the UI)
  5. Added size of root folder in UI
  6. Added option to rename root folders
  7. Added timeout to hosting changes

Misc

  1. Added option in Mass Editor to change root folders
  2. Added flag (-d/--DatabaseFolder) for overriding DB folder (#157)

Changed

UI

  1. Fixed using UI for multiple instances (#133)
  2. Moved Mass Edit page to button on home page
  3. Moved credentials to Download Clients settings page
  4. Changed format preference selector (#151)

Library Import

  1. Fixed handling of files with volume ranges
  2. Files directly in a root folder are not processed

Volume(s)

  1. Fixed posters of volumes when having more than 1000 volumes

Downloading

  1. Fixed queue freezing

Settings/System

  1. Changed TPB file format to Special Version file format
  2. Renamed convert settings and rephrased descriptions (#151)

Misc

  1. Fixed database locking up
  2. Changed Mass Convert and Mass Rename to tasks
  3. Fixed archive extraction for single-issue archives

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Casvt/Kapowarr/compare/V1.0.0-beta-4...V1.0.0
